dialogue.text: *A box still intact is full of cans*
<color=yellow>Lewons contain a lot of caffeine making them a great way to stay strong and active.</color>
<color=yellow>Be careful though, even if it makes you sharp and faster, it barely fills up your stamina</color>
<color=yellow>Eating Lewons will give you a faster-walking speed for</color> <color=red>90sec</color>
